
                            
                            <p>半年前本地村里人自己种植的花生在本地加工厂加工的花生油，我买了一桶110元，今天发现油壶底有固定物体，这个不会是什么 黄霉曲什么吧？之前我把抄的肥肉猪油往油壶里面倒了一点，跟这个有关系吗？ <br> 最后一张图是我把油都倒入垃圾桶，用筷子捡了一小块放到抽纸上。<img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/06/081334leqeyeaq444jbexi.jpeg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/06/081334leqeyeaq444jbexi.jpeg"><img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/06/081338njwyygqmjkjz5mir.jpeg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/06/081338njwyygqmjkjz5mir.jpeg"><img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/06/081341camkomrk0ymay0ll.jpeg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/06/081341camkomrk0ymay0ll.jpeg"><img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/06/081345lg0haftmt0hkhkfo.jpeg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/06/081345lg0haftmt0hkhkfo.jpeg"><img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/06/081350ho77300mpd5y03mj.jpeg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/06/081350ho77300mpd5y03mj.jpeg"><img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/06/081354csfrkbofmmcwfkko.jpeg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/06/081354csfrkbofmmcwfkko.jpeg">	    	     <br> </p><p class="pl">正常，见怪不怪。个人加工都是这样。工艺限制。</p><p class="pl">正常</p>
